title: PositionOpeningType
description: Complete data on a position opening

id.description: UNIQUE ID of the position opening in the 8vance system.

statusCode.description: Status of position opening; typical values: Active, Closed, Incomplete.

url.description: URL of the position opening, if available.

source.description: Identifier of the source of the profile, e.g. the customer name.

customer_source.description: Identifier of the customer source of the profile

creation_date.description: Creation date of the position opening in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

import_date.description: Date of scraping/importing the profile to the 8vance system, format yyyy-mm-dd.

languageCode.description: The primary language of the content of the profile as two-letter codes (ISO 639-1).

organization.description: Details regarding the organization that has an open position
